paramInformation.label: Energy minimum report time
paramInformation.description: Minimum time between two (non-requested) energy values

paramInformation.label: Energy maximum report time
paramInformation.description: Maximum time between two energy values, independently of changes in the value

paramInformation.label: Power minimum report time
paramInformation.description: Minimum time between two (non-requested) power values

paramInformation.label: Power maximum report time
paramInformation.description: Maximum time between two power values, independently of changes in the value

paramInformation.label: Energy delta value
paramInformation.description: Minimum change required for a new energy value to be transmitted.

paramInformation.label: Power delta value
paramInformation.description: Minimum change required for a new power value to be transmitted.

paramInformation.label: Safety shutdown configuration
paramInformation.description: Behaviour in the event of a safety shutdown

paramInformation.label: Night mode
paramInformation.description: Set Night mode of the Status LED

paramInformation.label: Info LED colour
paramInformation.description: Set color of the Info LED
